name: THC
description:
THC is a visual novel for adults.

Play as an adult human woman who is tagging along with her friend, Jenny. It's Jenny's twenty-third birthday and she wants to find a way to celebrate it.

There are no choices and only one ending.

Version 1.2 added 8 new CGs (high quality renders).
Version 1.1 added 6 new CGs (high quality renders) and fixed a previous CG.
